Text.Name: Reader
Text.Desc: A well-educated person, capable of comprehending obscure content.

Text.Name: Craftsman
Text.DisplayName: นักประดิษย์
Text.Desc: A person who excels at handicraft. This one excels at making things fast and well.

Text.Name: CraftsmanEX
Text.DisplayName: ผู้ชื่นชอบกันดั้ม
Text.Desc: A person obsessed with Gunpla models who has a pair of skilled hands as a result. This one excels at making things fast and well.

Text.Name: Artist
Text.DisplayName: ศิลปินพรสวรรค์
Text.Desc: A person with a sensitive heart rich in emotions, this one possesses an unparalleled imagination.

Text.Name: Warrior
Text.Desc: A natural warrior, this one is able to endure great pains and keep calm under any circumstances.

Text.Name: DeepPotential
Text.DisplayName: พรสวรรค์ฝึกตน
Text.Desc: A person born with great talent, this one can cultivate effortlessly.
